Articles.Content: After updating KSP throw the patcher . I then load KSP and see that all of my active missions are deleted and there is no asteroids . I have checked the space objects and unknown tab and theres no asteroids. Also i ran the patcher 2 times. Is there a way to fix this?. Pretty upset i lost my space station
I still have all my saves, but I too am seeing no asteroids. Perhaps they only exist in career mode?

Looks like you need to start a new game to make them appear.

Just created a new save on my .23 backup, imported it into 23.5, loaded - no asteroids after 10-minute maxwarp waiting. Created a new 23.5 save - got two unknown objects on my first visit to tracking station.
100 days and nothing happened i think this is a bug
I got them to load in a sandbox game, I do have my stuff in space but I can't load my stuff in the VAB..
You have to start a new save.

I got them in an old save BUT I did start a new one then went back into my old save, but as I said, my stuff in space are there, I can control them, but I can't load old stuff (gray names)

*edited* Oh wait a second, my sandbox turned into a career mode! 8| interesting.. that's why I can't load old stuff, I DIDNT RESEARCHED THEM! Somehow making a new career save overide my sandbox into a creer save?? Alright alright.. no can't go back to research everything now, come on I had a station, I had fuel depot, satellites buzzing everywhere, hey I had prepared for that now what I gotta do it all over again? But the thing is, if I start a new sandbox save, will it be overide again? Who's the kerbal in charge here...

Edited April 1, 2014 by NCSwitch
And that, folks, is why you back up your saves, or better yet, the entire old install before you update!

So, I've reloaded my career-turned-sandbox old save after I've created a new 0.23.5 career save:

- It magically turned back to career!

- I've got asteroids!

- Nothing is researched and I've got 0 science points (I had about 80k before ARM update)!

As Danny once said in his 0.17 Jool landing video:

What the actual fluffy bunnies!

Edited April 1, 2014 by sal_vager

And that, folks, is why you back up your saves, or better yet, the entire old install before you update!

Neneneno.. I refuse this conclusion, my save was only locked once I made a new save, therefor, something overide the status somewhere, or when the asteroid generating thingy kicked in, it might have played with either the save was a sandbox or a career... There must be a "true" or a "SANDBOX" I can put in somewhere to unlock this, I've checked in the persistent.sfs real quick, there is still [Title = Jim (SANDBOX)]

Alright, either you make these science stuff or, you go open your Steam/SteamApps/common/Kerbal Space Program/saves/[your save]/persistent.sfs

There, you locate

SCENARIO

{

name = ResearchAndDevelopment

scene = 5, 6, 7, 8, 9

sci = 0

}

and input sci=99999999999999

And then just unlock everything, seem to work so far I'm unlocking them right now

*edited* works in the VAB, I can access everything and load everything, thank you come again

Edited April 1, 2014 by NCSwitch
It would seem that in order to get asteroids, you need a new save. Darn it all.
